context: The integration of large language models (LLMs) into knowledge-based question answering (KBQA) presents challenges due to their high costs and lack of domain-specific knowledge during pre-training. context: Large Language Models (LLMs) face challenges due to their overreliance on potentially flawed parametric knowledge, leading to hallucinations and inaccuracies, especially with long-tail, domain-specific queries.
